element-citation.article-title: Comparison of three Ki-67 index quantification methods and clinical significance in pancreatic neuroendocrine tumors

citation-alternatives.mixed-citation: Kroneman, T. N. et al. Comparison of three Ki-67 index quantification methods and clinical significance in pancreatic neuroendocrine tumors. Endocr. Pathol.26, 255–262. 10.1007/s12022-015-9379-2 (2015).26072124
